meanings.definition: In a distant or reserved manner.
meanings.sent1: She watched the game aloofly from the sidelines.
meanings.sent2: He stood aloofly at the edge of the party, observing quietly.
meanings.sent3: The cat sat aloofly on the windowsill, ignoring everyone around.
meanings.sent4: The moon shone aloofly in the night sky, casting a cold light.
meanings.sent5: The teacher spoke aloofly, as if lost in thought, barely noticing the students.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of interest or involvement.
meanings.sent1: The aloofly student rarely participated in class discussions.
meanings.sent2: Her aloofly attitude towards the project made collaboration difficult.
meanings.sent3: The aloofly cat lounged lazily in the sun, indifferent to the world.
meanings.sent4: The aloofly mountain peak seemed uninterested in the bustling city below.
meanings.sent5: His aloofly expression revealed his disinterest in the conversation.

meanings.sent1: The aloofly girl preferred to read alone during recess.
meanings.sent2: He maintained an aloofly demeanor, avoiding social gatherings.
meanings.sent3: The aloofly tree stood solitary in the field, away from the others.
meanings.sent4: The aloofly island remained isolated from the mainland, distant and separate.
meanings.sent5: The aloofly artist worked quietly in his studio, away from the bustling city life.
